thread.title: Cleverly Designed Silver Earrings That Hide a Handy Lock Pick Set In Plain Sight
thread.title_full: Cleverly Designed Silver Earrings That Hide a Handy Lock Pick Set In Plain Sight

author: Lori Dorn
title: Cleverly Designed Silver Earrings That Hide a Handy Lock Pick Set In Plain Sight

organizations.name: geekologie related laughing squid posts lock pick earrings

text:
Bob and Christine of Lockpicking Extreme have created a very handy and stylish pair of silver earrings that cleverly hide a complete lock pick set in plain sight. Currently, there are two styles to choose from – a decorative open triangle or a swirly heart .

Lockpick Extreme also carries another set of earrings that cleverly hide a handcuff shim underneath a pair of angel wings.
A post shared by Lockpick Extreme (@lockpickextreme) on Jan 19, 2017 at 11:56am PST 


via Geekologie Related Laughing Squid Posts Lock Pick Earrings, Jewelry For When You Forget Your Keys A Cleverly Designed Set of Stackable Planetary Rings That Form a Tiny Sterling Silver Solar System A Cleverly Designed Functioning Steel Guitar That’s Built Onto a Blank Skateboard Deck
